plot: Zuko has joined up with Aang's group and is now ready to teach Aang fire bending. Unfortunately, Zuko has found out that he has lost his ability and must now relearn it. Zuko and Aang travel to find the original source of fire bending.

Zuko has joined up with Aang's group and is now ready to teach Aang fire bending. Unfortunately, Zuko has found out that he has lost his ability and must now relearn it. Zuko and Aang travel to find the original source of fire bending so that they both can learn from The Firebending Masters.—Aserrano

Zuko has officially joined Aang and his friends in order to take down the Fire Lord and put an end to the war. When Zuko tries to teach Aang how to fire bend, the lesson doesn't go well, when Zuko begins losing his bending. Zuko and Aang must learn how to fire bend from the sun warriorrs, they reveal that Ran and Shaw are the last remaining dragons. Both Zuko and Aang are able to fire bend by using an ancient art called "the dancing dragon".—dawsonpersi
